Body: There are so many guides that say SuperSU is a "rooting app".A method of rooting a phone is to install SuperSU as a .zip:How to Root Redmi Note 3Then, SuperSU shows up as an app in Play store that requires root: SuperSU - Google PlayThis article says that the way to root zenfone 2 is to install SuperSU.zipHere is another guide where installing SuperSU is a way to root a phone.Who is correct? Is it a way to root or is it an app that requires root?
Title: Is SuperSU a "rooting app" or is it an "app that requires root"?

history.Text: There are so many guide that says that supersu is a rooting app.A way to root a phone is to install supersu.http://en.miui.com/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=217175&highlight=Root%2B7.1.8&mobile=2Then searching for Supersu will show an app in playstore that says that supersu requires rootWhich one is right?Is it a way to root or is it an app that requires root?
Is supersu a rooting apps or is it an app that need to be rooted?

There are so many guide that says that supersu is a rooting app.A way to root a phone is to install supersu.http://en.miui.com/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=217175&highlight=Root%2B7.1.8&mobile=2Then searching for Supersu will show an app in playstore that says that supersu requires roothttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=eu.chainfire.supersuThis http://howtorootmobile.com/root-asus-zenfone-2-and-install-cwm-recovery/ says that the way to root zenfone 2 is to install supersu.zipWhich one is right?Is it a way to root or is it an app that requires root?

There are so many guide that says that supersu is a rooting app.A way to root a phone is to install supersu.http://en.miui.com/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=217175&highlight=Root%2B7.1.8&mobile=2Then searching for Supersu will show an app in playstore that says that supersu requires roothttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=eu.chainfire.supersuThis http://howtorootmobile.com/root-asus-zenfone-2-and-install-cwm-recovery/ says that the way to root zenfone 2 is to install supersu.zipWhich one is right?Is it a way to root or is it an app that requires root?Here is another "guide" where installing supersu is a way to root a phonehttp://xiaomi.eu/community/threads/ultimate-guide-how-to-unlock-bootloader-root-and-flash-recovery-on-redmi-note-3.29213/

There are so many guidew that say SuperSU is a "rooting app".A method of rooting a phone is to install SuperSU as a .zip:http://en.miui.com/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=217175&highlight=Root%2B7.1.8&mobile=2Then, SuperSU shows up as an app in playstore that requires root:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=eu.chainfire.supersu[This article](http://howtorootmobile.com/root-asus-zenfone-2-and-install-cwm-recovery/) says that the way to root zenfone 2 is to install Supersu.zip[Here][1] is another "guide" where installing supersu is a way to root a phone.**Who is correct?** Is it a *way to root* or is it *an app* that requires root?  [1]: http://xiaomi.eu/community/threads/ultimate-guide-how-to-unlock-bootloader-root-and-flash-recovery-on-redmi-note-3.29213/
Is SuperSU a "rooting app" or is it an "app that requires root"?

history.Comment: Proposed by 101950 approved by 131553, -1 edit id of 15737

history.Text: There are so many guides that say SuperSU is a "rooting app".A method of rooting a phone is to install SuperSU as a .zip:[How to Root Redmi Note 3][1]Then, SuperSU shows up as an app in Play store that requires root: [SuperSU - Google Play][2][This article](http://howtorootmobile.com/root-asus-zenfone-2-and-install-cwm-recovery/) says that the way to root zenfone 2 is to install _SuperSU.zip_[Here][3] is another guide where installing *SuperSU* is a way to root a phone.**Who is correct?** Is it a *way to root* or is it *an app* that requires root?  [1]: http://en.miui.com/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=217175&highlight=Root%2B7.1.8&mobile=2  [2]: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=eu.chainfire.supersu  [3]: http://xiaomi.eu/community/threads/ultimate-guide-how-to-unlock-bootloader-root-and-flash-recovery-on-redmi-note-3.29213/
